p: The essential oil (EOS) showed the highest effectiveness in inhibiting the growth of coliform bacteria. The use of the essential oil resulted in a significant ( p < 0.05) reduction in the number of these microorganisms compared to the Control (Table 6). BAADER meat analyzed after 6 and 9 months of storage and immediately after production (“0”) and 1 month of storage proved to be the least contaminated with these microorganisms.
